name: Active Days Counter
description: Build a feature that displays the total number of active days a user has spent on the portal, based on engagement actions like clicks, views, and transactions. Displayed on user profile/dashboard to motivate engagement.
goals: Increase user engagement by providing visible activity metrics
Motivate users to return to the portal regularly
Create foundation for future gamification features
Deliver a quick win with immediate value
constraints: Must work for all existing users
